text: JAKARTA, Jan 12 Indonesias oil lifting stood at 660,000 barrels of oil per day last year, its energy minister Arifin Tasrif said on Wednesday.Indonesias gas lifting meanwhile, came at 982,000 bpd equivalent, he told a conference. (Reporting by Bernadette Christina Munthe; Writing by Fathin Ungku; Editing by Martin Petty)
